sub_title: Independent Contract and Claim Management Expert
summary:
Mr.Mak has a MSc in Civil Engineering and has gained 34 years of experience worldwide in the consulting and contracting industry of which 29 years spent working in developing countries in the capacity of Project Director and Contract and Claim management expert.
As Project Director responsible for executing and administering over 14 service contracts in 10 different countries in Africa over the past 15 years; liaising with Contracting Authorities, Ministries, EU Delegations and Funding Agencies.
As Contract and Claim management expert, specialised in airport construction (15 years) and road construction projects (15 years plus); extensive experience of EDF procedures and conditions of contract and WB/AfDB/ADB/KWF procedures and conditions of contract in the French and English language. Assisting Clients, Contractors and Funding Agencies with amicable settlements of claims. Analysis proejct and contract risks and managing risks. Assisting clients with evaluation of bids for ICB contracts.
As Independent Claim Expert, engaged by various EU Delegations (The Gambia, Cap Vert, Tanzania, Ethiopia, Cameroon, Senegal) for numerous road construction claims: reviewed / assessed / assisted with amicable settlements and prepared full reports. Fully conversant in the French, English and Dutch language (speaking, reading and writing)
